casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Harris, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Harris, 130 Ohio St.3d 362, 2011-Ohio-5783.]

(No. 2011-1238 Submitted October 18, 2011 Decided November 15, 2011.) Joseph T. Deters, Hamilton County Prosecuting Attorney, and Paula Adams, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Joshua L. Goode, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The discretionary appeal is accepted.

{¶ 2} The cause is remanded to the court of appeals for application of State v. Williams, 129 Ohio St.3d 344, 2011-Ohio-3374, 952 N.E.2d 1108.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, Lanzinger, Cupp, and McGee Brown, JJ., concur. O’Donnell, J., dissents.
